研究突出了医疗文献中Chatgpt的优点和缺点在一项比较初级医疗实习生与Chatgpt的研究中，台湾台北医科大学的研究人员发现，尽管AI擅长创建准确，完整的医疗记录，但它努力与人类临床医生的同情和细微的沟通相匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-highlights-chatgpts-chatgpts-strengths-strengths-and-weaknesses-in-medical-documentation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/study-highlights-chatgpts-chatgpts-strengths-strengths-engenths-ind-weaknesses-in-medical-documentation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc1E3958-D0A8-4D24-4D24-AC69-490C81A18351 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 12:42:31 -0400 Study highlights ChatGPT's strengths and weaknesses in medical documentation
